name: OVERTIME (itch) (Turnip_liker)
description:
OVERTIME : DEMO VERSION[?]

Overtime is a low-poly horror first person office sim.

Experience the unrivalled thrill of;

  • Attending meetings.
  • Dealing with your troublesome co-workers...
  • And doing what you gotta do to make it through another day!

[Please be aware; this game contains low res blood, injury depiction, and violence.]

Controls:

WASD movement, C to Crouch, SHIFT to Sprint.

DEV NOTES

This was a solo project made over the course of the 10 day long 2021 SCREAMJAM. Be sure to check out the other entries!

Playthrough is about 20mins, but obviously this depends on you.

Please view the included .txt file for full credits, and additional dev notes from me to you, yes you.

[Additional bug fixes post jam voting period.]

Install Instructions : Simply Extract .zip to a location and/or folder of your choice and play Overtime.exe
